demolition

Class GameController

  • java.lang.Object
    • demolition.GameController

  • public class GameController
extends java.lang.Object

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void draw()
      Draws all components of the game to application window
      void gameOver()
      Ran if game is lost, sets playing attribute to false
      void levelComplete()
      Ran when a level is complete Will load next level or run win method if no levels remain
      void reMap()
      Will create map of original config for a level.
      void tick()
      Runs tick on game controller Measures time spent in the level and checks player has not lost
      void win()
      Ran if player wins.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • tick

        public void tick()
        Runs tick on game controller Measures time spent in the level and checks player has not lost

      • draw

        public void draw()
        Draws all components of the game to application window

      • reMap

        public void reMap()
        Will create map of original config for a level.

      • gameOver

        public void gameOver()
        Ran if game is lost, sets playing attribute to false

      • levelComplete

        public void levelComplete()
        Ran when a level is complete Will load next level or run win method if no levels remain

      • win

        public void win()
        Ran if player wins. Sets win attribute to true and playing to false
